items.author: Neal Stephenson
items.summary: 'A brilliant patchwork of code-breaking mathematicians and their descendants who are striving to create a data haven in the Philippines...trust me on this one' Guardian
items.title: Cryptonomicon

items.author: Hannu Rajaniemi
items.summary: The most exciting SF debut of the last five years - a star to stand alongside Alistair Reynolds and Richard Morgan.
items.title: The Quantum Thief
